00024 #define EIG2GV2(p) vector2f((p).x(),(p).y())
00025 #define EIG2GV3(p) vector3f((p).x(),(p).y(),(p).z())

00043 KinectRawDepthCam::KinectRawDepthCam()
00044 {
00045   a = 3.008;
00046   b = -0.002745;
00047   /*
00048   a = 3.008;
00049   b = -0.002805;
00050   */
00051   f = 600.0;
00052   width = 640;
00053   height = 480;
00054   fovH = RAD(57.00);
00055   fovV = RAD(43.0); 
00056   maxDepthVal = 1500;
00057   pointCloudLookups.clear();
00058   initDepthReconstructionLookups();
00059 }
00060 
00061 vector3f KinectRawDepthCam::depthValueTo3D(int row, int col, void* depthValue)
00062 {
00063   unsigned int ind = row*width+col;
00064   uint16_t _depth = *((uint16_t*)depthValue);
00065   return depthLookups[_depth]*pointCloudLookups[ind];
00066 }
00067 
00068 float KinectRawDepthCam::rawDepthToMetricDepth(void* depthValue)
00069 {
00070   uint16_t _depth = *((uint16_t*)depthValue);
00071   return depthLookups[_depth];
00072 }
00073 
00074 vector3f KinectRawDepthCam::depthPixelTo3D(int ind, void* depthImage)
00075 {
00076   uint16_t* _depth = (uint16_t*) depthImage;
00077   return depthLookups[_depth[ind]]*pointCloudLookups[ind];
00078 }
00079 
00080 vector3f KinectRawDepthCam::depthPixelTo3D(int row, int col, void* depthImage)
00081 {
00082   uint16_t* _depth = (uint16_t*) depthImage;
00083   unsigned int ind = row*width+col;
00084   return depthLookups[_depth[ind]]*pointCloudLookups[ind];
00085 }
00086 
00087 void KinectRawDepthCam::initDepthReconstructionLookups()
00088 {
00089   float h = 1.0/f;
00090   float v = 1.0/f;
00091   double tanHFovH = tan(fovH*0.5); 
00092   double tanHFovV = tan(fovV*0.5);
00093   float x,y,z;
00094   int ind;
00095   
00096   pointCloudLookups.resize(height*width);
00097   
00098   for(unsigned int row = 0; row<height; row++){
00099     for(unsigned int col = 0; col<width; col++){
00100       ind = row*width + col;
00101       y = -(float(col)/((float(width)-1.0)*0.5)-1.0)*tanHFovH;
00102       z = -(float(row)/((float(height)-1.0)*0.5)-1.0)*tanHFovV;
00103       pointCloudLookups[ind] = vector3f(1.0f,y,z,1.0f);
00104     }
00105   }
00106   
00107   for(int depth = 0; depth<65536; depth++){
00108     depthLookups[depth] = 1.0/(a+b*float(depth));
00109   }
00110 }
00111 
00112 bool KinectRawDepthCam::isValidDepth(int row, int col, void* depthImage)
00113 {
00114   uint16_t* _depth = (uint16_t*) depthImage;
00115   uint16_t depthVal = _depth[row*width+col];
00116   return depthVal<=maxDepthVal && depthVal>0; 
00117 }
00118 
00119 bool KinectRawDepthCam::isValidDepth(int ind, void* depthImage)
00120 {
00121   uint16_t* _depth = (uint16_t*) depthImage;
00122   uint16_t depthVal = _depth[ind];
00123   return depthVal<=maxDepthVal && depthVal>0; 
00124 }

00132   f = 600.0;
00133   width = 640;
00134   height = 480;
00135   fovH = RAD(57.00/2);
00136   fovV = RAD(43.0/2);

00170   uint16_t* _depth = (uint16_t*) depthImage;
00171   unsigned int ind = row*width+col;
00172   return _depth[ind]<maxDepthVal;

00175 bool KinectOpenNIDepthCam::isValidDepth(int ind, void* depthImage)
00176 {
00177   return true;
00178   uint16_t* _depth = (uint16_t*) depthImage;
00179   return _depth[ind]<maxDepthVal;
00180 }
00181 
00182 void KinectOpenNIDepthCam::initDepthReconstructionLookups()
00183 {
00184   float h = 1.0/f;
00185   float v = 1.0/f;
00186   float x,y,z;
00187   int ind;
00188   
00189   pointCloudLookups.resize(height*width);
00190   
00191   for(unsigned int row = 0; row<height; row++){
00192     for(unsigned int col = 0; col<width; col++){
00193       ind = row*width + col;
00194       y = -h*(float(col)-(float(width)-1.0)*0.5);
00195       z = -v*(float(row)-(float(height)-1.0)*0.5);
00196       pointCloudLookups[ind] = vector3f(1.0f,y,z,1.0f);
00197     }
00198   }
00199 }

00216 void PlaneFilter::clearPerformanceStats()
00217 {
00218   planeFilteringTimer.clear();
00219   numSampledLocations = 0;
00220   numPlanarPoints = 0;
00221   numNonPlanarPoints = 0;
00222 }

00224 void PlaneFilter::getPerformanceStats(double& planeFilteringTime, int& numSampledLocations, int& numPlanarPoints, int& numNonPlanarPoints)
00225 {
00226   planeFilteringTime = planeFilteringTimer.time();
00227   numSampledLocations = this->numSampledLocations;
00228   numPlanarPoints = this->numPlanarPoints;
00229   numNonPlanarPoints = this->numNonPlanarPoints;

00232 
00233 uint32_t PlaneFilter::lcgRand()
00234 {
00235   lastRand = 1103515245*lastRand+12345;
00236   return lastRand;
00237 }
00238 
00239 inline bool PlaneFilter::sampleLocation(void* depthImage, int& index, int& row, int& col, Vector3f& p, int rMin, int height, int cMin, int width)
00240 {
00241   unsigned int retries = 0;
00242   bool valid = false;
00243   while( !valid && retries<=filterParams.numRetries){
00244     row = rMin + (lcgRand()%height);
00245     col = cMin + (lcgRand()%width);
00246     index = row*depthCam->width + col;
00247     valid = depthCam->isValidDepth(index,depthImage);
00248     numSampledLocations++;
00249     retries++;
00250   }
00251   if(valid) p = Vector3f(V3COMP(depthCam->depthPixelTo3D(index,depthImage)));
00252   return valid;
00253 }
00254 
00255 void PlaneFilter::GenerateCompletePointCloud(void* depthImage, vector< vector3f >& pointCloud, std::vector< int >& pixelLocs)
00256 {
00257   pointCloud.clear();
00258   pixelLocs.clear();
00259   int numPixels = depthCam->height*depthCam->width;
00260 
00261   for (int i=0; i<numPixels; i++) {
00262     if(!depthCam->isValidDepth(i,depthImage)){
00263       continue;
00264     }
00265     pointCloud.push_back(depthCam->depthPixelTo3D(i,depthImage));
00266     pixelLocs.push_back(i);
00267   }
00268 }
00269 
00270 void PlaneFilter::GenerateSampledPointCloud(void* depthImage, vector< vector3f >& pointCloud, unsigned int numPoints)
00271 {
00272   int row, col, ind;
00273   Vector3f p;
00274   for(unsigned int i=0; i<numPoints; i++){
00275     if(sampleLocation(depthImage,ind, row, col, p, 0, depthCam->height-1, 0, depthCam->width-1))
00276       pointCloud.push_back(vector3f(p.x(),p.y(),p.z()));
00277   }
00278 }
00279 
00280 void PlaneFilter::PointCloudFromRaster(void* depth, vector< vector3f >& pointCloud, unsigned int raster)
00281 {
00282   static const bool debug = false;
00283   float row, col;
00284   vector3f p;
00285   pointCloud.clear();
00286   if(raster>depthCam->height-1)
00287     return;
00288   for(unsigned int i=0; i<depthCam->width; i++){
00289     row = raster;
00290     col = i;
00291     int index = row*depthCam->width + col;
00292     if(!depthCam->isValidDepth(index,depth))
00293       continue;
00294     p = depthCam->depthPixelTo3D(index, depth);
00295     pointCloud.push_back(p);
00296     if(debug) printf("%f, %f, %f\n",V3COMP(p));
00297   }
00298 }
00299 
00300 void PlaneFilter::GenerateFilteredPointCloud(void* depthImage, vector< vector3f >& filteredPointCloud, vector< vector2i >& pixelLocs, vector< vector3f >& pointCloudNormals, vector< vector3f >& outlierCloud, vector< PlanePolygon >& polygons)
00301 { 
00302   static const bool debug = false;
00303 
00304   planeFilteringTimer.start();
00305   
00306   polygons.clear();
00307   filteredPointCloud.clear();
00308   pixelLocs.clear();
00309   pointCloudNormals.clear();
00310   outlierCloud.clear();
00311   
00312   filteredPointCloud.reserve(2*filterParams.maxPoints);
00313   pixelLocs.reserve(2*filterParams.maxPoints);
00314   pointCloudNormals.reserve(2*filterParams.maxPoints);
00315   outlierCloud.reserve(filterParams.numSamples);
00316   
00317   // Derived parameters
00318   float minInliers = filterParams.minInlierFraction*filterParams.numLocalSamples;
00319   float maxOutliers = (1.0-filterParams.minInlierFraction)*filterParams.numLocalSamples;
00320   float planeSizeH = 0.5*filterParams.planeSize;
00321   float planeSize = filterParams.planeSize;
00322   float w2 = depthCam->width-filterParams.planeSize;
00323   float h2 = depthCam->height-filterParams.planeSize;
00324   // Counters
00325   unsigned int numPlanes = 0;
00326   unsigned int numPoints = 0;
00327   
00328   // Sample locations
00329   int ind1,ind2,ind3;
00330   
00331   float sampleRadiusHFactor = filterParams.WorldPlaneSize*depthCam->width/(4.0*tan(depthCam->fovH));
00332   float sampleRadiusVFactor = filterParams.WorldPlaneSize*depthCam->height/(4.0*tan(depthCam->fovV));
00333   
00334   Vector3f p1, p2, p3, p;
00335   vector2i l1, l2, l3, l;
00336   
00337   vector<vector3f> neighborhoodInliers;
00338   vector<vector2i> neighborhoodPixelLocs;
00339   
00340   float d, meanDepth;
00341   int sampleRadiusH, sampleRadiusV, rMin, rMax, cMin, cMax, dR, dC;
00342   
00343   for(unsigned int i=0; i<filterParams.numSamples && numPoints<filterParams.maxPoints; i++){
00344     
00345     //generate random point p1 anywhere on image
00346     if(!sampleLocation(depthImage, ind1, l1.y, l1.x, p1, planeSizeH, h2, planeSizeH, w2))
00347       continue;
00348     
00349     //generate random point p2 within max distance params.planeSize from p1
00350     if(!sampleLocation(depthImage, ind2, l2.y, l2.x, p2, l1.y-planeSizeH, planeSize, l1.x-planeSizeH, planeSize))
00351       continue;
00352     
00353     //generate random point p3 within max distance params.planeSize from p1
00354     if(!sampleLocation(depthImage, ind3, l3.y, l3.x, p3, l1.y-planeSizeH, planeSize, l1.x-planeSizeH, planeSize))
00355       continue;
00356     
00357     //Generate Plane normal (n) and distance (d) from origin (distance-normal parameterization of plane)
00358     Vector3f n = ((p1-p2).cross(p3-p2)).normalized();
00359     
00360     d = p1.dot(n);
00361     meanDepth = (p1.x()+p2.x()+p3.x())*0.333333333333333333333333;
00362     sampleRadiusH = ceil(sampleRadiusHFactor/meanDepth*sqrt(1.0-sq(n.y())));
00363     sampleRadiusV = ceil(sampleRadiusVFactor/meanDepth*sqrt(1.0-sq(n.z())));
00364     rMin = max(0,l1.y-sampleRadiusV);
00365     rMax = min(depthCam->height-1,l1.y+sampleRadiusV);
00366     cMin = max(0,l1.x-sampleRadiusH);
00367     cMax = min(depthCam->width-1,l1.x+sampleRadiusH);
00368     dR = rMax-rMin;
00369     dC = cMax-cMin;
00370     
00371     if(sampleRadiusH<2.0 || sampleRadiusV<2.0){
00372       //printf("FSPF error %d,%d %f,%f,%f %f\u00b0, %f, %d, %f\n",sampleRadiusH,sampleRadiusV,n.x(),n.y(),n.z(),DEG(depthCam->fovH),filterParams.WorldPlaneSize,depthCam->width, meanDepth);
00373       continue;
00374     }
00375     
00376     int inliers = 0, outliers = 0;
00377     neighborhoodInliers.clear();
00378     neighborhoodPixelLocs.clear();
00379     for(unsigned int j=0; outliers<maxOutliers && j<filterParams.numLocalSamples; j++){
00380       //generate random point p within max distance params.planeSize from p1
00381       int r,c,ind;
00382       if(!sampleLocation(depthImage, ind, l.y, l.x, p, rMin, dR, cMin, dC))
00383         continue;
00384       
00385       float err = fabs(n.dot(p) - d);
00386       if(err<filterParams.maxError && p.x()<meanDepth+filterParams.maxDepthDiff && p.x()>meanDepth-filterParams.maxDepthDiff){
00387         inliers++;
00388         neighborhoodInliers.push_back(EIG2GV3(p));
00389         neighborhoodPixelLocs.push_back(l);
00390       }else{
00391         outliers++;
00392       }
00393     }
00394     if(inliers>=minInliers && inliers>3){
00395       //==Polygonization==
00396       if(filterParams.runPolygonization){
00397         PlanePolygon poly(neighborhoodInliers,neighborhoodPixelLocs);
00398         if(poly.validPolygon)
00399           polygons.push_back(poly);
00400         n = Vector3f(V3COMP(poly.normal));
00401       }
00402       //This is a local plane
00403       vector3f ng = EIG2GV3(n);
00404       ng.w = 0;
00405       for(int i=0; i<(int)neighborhoodInliers.size(); i++){
00406         //filteredPointCloud.push_back(pointCloud[i]);
00407         filteredPointCloud.push_back(neighborhoodInliers[i]);
00408         pointCloudNormals.push_back(ng);
00409         pixelLocs.push_back(neighborhoodPixelLocs[i]);
00410       }
00411       filteredPointCloud.push_back(EIG2GV3(p1));
00412       filteredPointCloud.push_back(EIG2GV3(p2));
00413       filteredPointCloud.push_back(EIG2GV3(p3));
00414       pointCloudNormals.push_back(ng);
00415       pointCloudNormals.push_back(ng);
00416       pointCloudNormals.push_back(ng);
00417       pixelLocs.push_back(l1);
00418       pixelLocs.push_back(l2);
00419       pixelLocs.push_back(l3);
00420       numPoints += neighborhoodInliers.size()+3;
00421       numPlanes = numPlanes+1;
00422       
00423     }else{
00424       for(int i=0; i<(int)neighborhoodInliers.size(); i++){
00425         outlierCloud.push_back(neighborhoodInliers[i]);
00426       }
00427       outlierCloud.push_back(EIG2GV3(p1));
00428       outlierCloud.push_back(EIG2GV3(p2));
00429       outlierCloud.push_back(EIG2GV3(p3));
00430     }
00431   }
00432   if(filterParams.runPolygonization && filterParams.filterOutliers){
00433     //Remove planar points from outlier cloud
00434     static const float MaxPlanarDist = filterParams.maxError;
00435     bool planar = false;
00436     for(unsigned int i=0; i<outlierCloud.size(); i++){ 
00437       planar = false;
00438       for(unsigned int j=0; !planar && j<polygons.size(); j++){ 
00439         planar = fabs(polygons[j].normal.dot(outlierCloud[i])+polygons[j].offset)<MaxPlanarDist;
00440       }
00441       if(planar){
00442         //Need to remove this point
00443         outlierCloud.erase(outlierCloud.begin()+i);
00444         i--;
00445       }
00446     }
00447   }
00448   numPlanarPoints = filteredPointCloud.size();
00449   numNonPlanarPoints = outlierCloud.size();
00450   planeFilteringTimer.stop();
00451 }
00452 
00453 
00454 vector<PlanePolygon> PlaneFilter::findUniqueDepthPlanes(vector< PlanePolygon > planes)
00455 {
00456   static const float MaxCosError = cos(RAD(20.0));
00457   static const float MaxPlaneDist = 0.02;
00458   static const float MinPlaneSize = 0.05;
00459   static const float MinConditionNumber = 0.2;
00460   vector<PlanePolygon> unique3DPlanes;
00461   
00462   for(unsigned int i=0; i<planes.size(); i++){
00463     
00464     if(planes[i].height<MinPlaneSize || planes[i].width<MinPlaneSize)
00465       continue;
00466     
00467     if(planes[i].conditionNumber<MinConditionNumber)
00468       continue;
00469     
00470     bool matchFound = false;
00471     for(unsigned int j=0; !matchFound && j<unique3DPlanes.size(); j++){
00472       matchFound = fabs(unique3DPlanes[j].normal.dot(planes[i].normal))<MaxCosError && fabs(unique3DPlanes[j].normal.dot(planes[i].p0)+unique3DPlanes[j].offset)<MaxPlaneDist ;
00473     }
00474     if(!matchFound)
00475       unique3DPlanes.push_back(planes[i]);
00476   }
00477   unsigned int numUniquePlanes = unique3DPlanes.size();
00478   
00479   return unique3DPlanes;
00480 }

00487 
00488 bool PlaneFilter::pointIsPlanar(void* depthImage, vector< PlanePolygon>& planes, int ind, float MaxError)
00489 {
00490   vector3f p = depthCam->depthPixelTo3D(ind,depthImage);
00491   
00492   for(unsigned int k=0; k<planes.size(); k++){
00493     if(fabs(planes[k].normal.dot(p)+planes[k].offset)<MaxError)
00494       return true;
00495   }
00496   return false;
00497 }
